Error.PossibleCauses: The operation failed due to an internal error.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation. If the issue persists, contact support.

Error.PossibleCauses: The operation failed due to an invalid client ID.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation. If the issue persists, contact support.

Error.PossibleCauses: The operation failed due to an invalid configuration.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation after correcting the configuration. If the issue persists, contact support.
